resources.string: Only one calendar can associated with one customer at a time. Please select another calendar.
Only one calendar can associated with one customer at a time. Please change the associated calendar of this customer.
During synchronization with Google Calendar, Working Time-entries with the same identifier will be overwritten by the newer version (in the Google Calendar OR in this application).
Multiple Google Accounts detected.\nPlease select Google Account.

Main calendars cannot be synchronized.
Press menu button to create additional (secondary) calendars.
All calendars (except main) for:

was edited locally and on the Google Calendar after the last synchronization. 

Which entry should override the other?
No customer with associated Google Calendar available.
Select customer to synchronize with associated Google Calendar.
Before you synchronize, please do not forget to associate new Customers with Projects, Tasks and Working times.
The Google Calendar associated with this Customer may have been edited or deleted. Please check / update the selected Google Calendar information associated with the selected Customer.
The Google Calendar entry of the local working time:\n\n

was not found on the calendar of this customer.

What do you want to do with the local working time?
